camel.sink.endpoint.propagateIncomingBod.name: camel.sink.endpoint.propagateIncomingBodyIfNoReturnValue
camel.sink.endpoint.propagateIncomingBod.description: Sets whether to propagate the incoming body if the return type of the underlying Ignite operation is void.

camel.sink.endpoint.treatCollectionsAsCa.name: camel.sink.endpoint.treatCollectionsAsCacheObjects
camel.sink.endpoint.treatCollectionsAsCa.description: Sets whether to treat Collections as cache objects or as Collections of items to insert/update/compute, etc.

camel.sink.endpoint.query.name: camel.sink.endpoint.query
camel.sink.endpoint.query.description: The Query to execute, only needed for operations that require it, and for the Continuous Query Consumer.

camel.sink.endpoint.cachePeekMode.name: camel.sink.endpoint.cachePeekMode
camel.sink.endpoint.cachePeekMode.description: The CachePeekMode, only needed for operations that require it (IgniteCacheOperation#SIZE). One of: [ALL] [NEAR] [PRIMARY] [BACKUP] [ONHEAP] [OFFHEAP]

camel.sink.endpoint.failIfInexistentCach.name: camel.sink.endpoint.failIfInexistentCache
camel.sink.endpoint.failIfInexistentCach.description: Whether to fail the initialization if the cache doesn't exist.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.operation.name: camel.sink.endpoint.operation
camel.sink.endpoint.operation.description: The cache operation to invoke. Possible values: GET, PUT, REMOVE, SIZE, REBALANCE, QUERY, CLEAR. One of: [GET] [PUT] [REMOVE] [SIZE] [REBALANCE] [QUERY] [CLEAR]

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.ignite-cache.configurati.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.configurationResource
camel.component.ignite-cache.configurati.description: The resource from where to load the configuration. It can be a: URL, String or InputStream type.

camel.component.ignite-cache.ignite.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.ignite
camel.component.ignite-cache.ignite.description: To use an existing Ignite instance.

camel.component.ignite-cache.igniteConfi.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.igniteConfiguration
camel.component.ignite-cache.igniteConfi.description: Allows the user to set a programmatic ignite configuration.

camel.component.ignite-cache.lazyStartPr.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.ignite-cache.lazyStartPr.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.ignite-cache.basicProper.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.ignite-cache.basicProper.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
